name: Some Of Our Parts
description:
Some of Our Parts

We get it. You're dead. Try and keep yourself together all right? There's a lot still to do...

A 2D side-scrolling platformer where you'll really have to work on yourself. Move through the bleak (albeit vibrant) scenery, pick up the pieces of your body-if not somebody else's- and make your way to becoming a complete person!

Make no bones about it, keeping it together sure ain't easy...

Submission for Gamedev.tv Game Jam 2022 - "Death is only the Beginning"
